directions: Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Fry ginger in hot oil until fragrant, then add pork, soy sauce, dark soy sauce, salt, and sugar. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes.
Stir in the sesame oil, green onion, and rice wine. Simmer until the pork is tender.
ingredients: 1/2 inch piece fresh ginger root, thinly sliced
title: Stir-Fry Pork with Ginger
